title: SHA1 to Hex String Converter
description: SHA1_TO_STRH SHA1 byte array to a hex string.
name: SHA1_TO_HEX_STRING

input.name: input_md5
input.description: An array containing the SHA1 hash in byte format.

output.name: output_string
output.description: A hexadecimal string representation of the SHA1 byte array.

return_value.description: The resulting hexadecimal string converted from the input SHA1 byte array.
